add_library(Assimp SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_property(TARGET Assimp PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x64/assimp-vc140-mt.lib)

file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/assimp-vc140-mt.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG})
file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/assimp-vc140-mt.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE})
file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/assimp-vc140-mt.dll DESTINATION ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE_DEBINFO})
